title: Canada Higher Education House
description: A site for researching and applying for scholarships in canada
heading: Privacy Policy
paragraphs: The Canada Higher Education House website is a tool to inform users about studying in Canadian universities and to allow users to apply for scholarships.

At Canada Higher Education House, we take your data privacy and security seriously. The Canada Higher Education House website only collects the information needed for you to use our services. We will never sell or share your information with a third party unless required by a lawful subpoena. The Canada Higher Education House uses cookies for the sole purpose of remembering users previously logged in on a given device. We do not track our users across the internet.

In the course of providing this online service, information is exchanged back and forth between the Canada Higher Education House servers, online users, and their browsers. In some instances on this site, you may be asked for your name, email address, and other information. Canada Higher Education House believes that your personal information deserves utmost protection. Your data is only collected for the purposes of: offering a customized experience on the Canada Higher Education House website, processing scholarship applications, attributing referrals, and contacting you if you win a scholarship or referral prize. While you can visit the site without registering or providing any personal information, you will need to register if you want to apply for a scholarship, be eligible for a referral prize, or use the full program search functionality. Again any information you provide is only used to help you use our siteâ€™s services and we do not track users across the internet.
If you have any questions about the data we store or how we use it, please contact us.
